segments.text: Hello , madam . Would you like to take a look at our products ? They are high-tech items .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hmm , they look interesting . Can I have a copy of your brochure ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . Do you have a minute ? Why don't you have a seat and let me show you how to operate this item ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You see , if you press this red button , the helmet becomes an umbrella .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How amazing ! I have never seen it before . Is it expensive ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It only costs you 20 dollars for one .
segments.speaker: S1
